name: MirrorMirror
0:
”Alexa, tell mirror mirror”
”Alexa, ask mirror mirror”
”Alexa, play mirror mirror”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mirror mirror
des: All you have to do is say mirror mirror and Alexa will give you a compliment. No matter how you feel when you ask she will make you smile. Its like always having your best friend right there with you. May not be suitable for all ages
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
